question.title: Invalid or unsupported WebDriver capabilities found ("ignoreHiddenApiPolicyError", ,,,,,,,,,,
question.body:
I am using Appium Inspector. After adding desired Capabilities and connecting my real device, I just run session and getting this error

Invalid or unsupported WebDriver capabilities found ("ignoreHiddenApiPolicyError", "disableWindowAnimation"). Ensure to only use valid W3C WebDriver capabilities (see https://w3c.github.io/webdriver/#capabilities).If you run your tests on a remote vendor, like Sauce Labs or BrowserStack, make sure that you put them into vendor specific capabilities, e.g. "sauce:options" or "bstack:options". Please reach out to to your vendor support team if you have further questions.
